meanings.definition: To produce an excessive amount of suds.
meanings.sent1: After adding too much soap, the washing machine started oversudsing.
meanings.sent2: She learned to be careful with detergent to avoid oversudsing her laundry.
meanings.sent3: The kids thought it was funny when the bubble bath kept oversudsing.
meanings.sent4: The dishwasher seemed to be oversudsing with excitement as it cleaned the dishes.
meanings.sent5: The image of the fountain oversudsing with foam was quite amusing.

meanings.definition: The act of creating too many suds.
meanings.sent1: The oversudsing of the soap made the floor slippery.
meanings.sent2: The laundry room had a sign warning about the dangers of oversudsing.
meanings.sent3: The oversudsing in the bathtub caused a hilarious bubble explosion.
meanings.sent4: The oversudsing in the sink looked like a fluffy white mountain.
meanings.sent5: The oversudsing in the car wash was a sight to behold.
